sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Button, FloatingLabel } from 'react-bootstrap' import results from '../results' const EditForm = (props) => { const uid = props.uid const type = props.type const [contactPerson, setContactPerson] = useState() const [companyName, setCompanyName] = useState() var d = new Date() var date = d.getFullYear() + '-' + (d.getMonth() + 1) + '-' + d.getDate() console.log(date) console.log(uid, type) useEffect(() => { results.get('/users/' + type + '/' + uid + '.json') .then(function (response) { console.log(response.data) setCompanyName(response.data.companyName) }).catch(function (error) { //error here console.log(error) }) }, []) const isAgency = props.type === 'serviceagency' ? true : false return (
{isAgency &&
setContactPerson(e.target.value)} /> setCompanyName(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} /> setSomething(e.target.value)} />
}
) } export default EditForm
